name.ja: <ruby>爆<rt>ばく</rt></ruby><ruby>撃<rt>げき</rt></ruby><ruby>獣<rt>じゅう</rt></ruby>ファイヤ・ボンバー

text.en:
1 Machine monster + 1 Pyro monster
If this card is Special Summoned: You can destroy all monsters your opponent controls with 1900 or less ATK. If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 monster your oppoennt controls with 1900 or less ATK; destroy it, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its original ATK. You can only use each effect of "Bombing Beast Fire Bomber" once per turn.
